page.title: 11STOCK-CAR RACING IN HAILSHAM
page.content: Every Wednesday at 8.00 there's normally{Bangers}and{Stock Rods but sometimes there's{Mini Stocks. { Bangers}are battered up normal cars, {Stock Rods}are long sausage shaped cars with wide wheels and{Mini Stocks are old minis. Later they have what's called {Production Cars;}ordinary saloons with added body protectors. They go round the track twice to see if they can get a good time. Then after that, if they want to, they have a five lap race and the winner gets Â£5. At the very end the Bangers normally have a{Demolition Derby.}They start off the same way but then they're allowed to turn around and go the opposite way, crashing into other cars as they go. They carry on until there's one car left.
